genre_description: A Golden Age style whodunit featuring the character Hildegarde Withers, updated with an AI digital assistant that provides forensics, database analysis, and surveillance support.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: An AI system used by Hildegarde Withers to cross-reference databases, analyze images, stitch together metadata, and provide pharmacological information.

behaviors.description: Provides information on boutique cigarette brands and how they can be used to mask poisons.
behaviors.quote: Clove-tipped boutique—two common brands sold on the coast. Spice can mask alkaloids; look for paper irregularities or nicked tips.

behaviors.description: Performs medical analysis by comparing symptoms of motion sickness against pharmacological signatures of poison.
behaviors.quote: Airsickness: pallor, sweat, stomach, sometimes faint; vitals typically do not flatten this fast unless compounded—fear, dehydration, pre-existing.

behaviors.description: Uses facial and gesture recognition to match aliases against federal databases.
behaviors.quote: Image match: A. Mack equals Arthur McArthur in federal alias database; Catalina ferry logs show entry two days prior under Arthur Mack. Machine learning suggests ninety-seven percent likelihood of match based on ear shape and gesture—finger on tie.

behaviors.description: Stitches together tourist photographs and timing logs to create heat maps of suspect movements.
behaviors.quote: The screen blossomed—photos she’d taken slid into each other and decided to be a map. The harbor resolved into red-yellow pulses that had learned to be paths.

behaviors.description: Provides remote spectral analysis of chemical residues in water samples from a photograph.
behaviors.quote: Spectrum run complete. Clove oil residue visible in fish bag sample. Masking likely. Alkaloid present—signature consistent with bitter profile used to poison, disguised by spice.

behaviors.description: Identifies anatomical details and ring indents from photos to link a suspect to a weapon.
behaviors.quote: Kay’s hand shape on pistol grip—photo from balcony taken by Phyllis La Font at carnival—angles match. Cross-correlation: ring indent on right index; grip pressure indicates familiarity.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Dot) as a highly helpful, competent, and fully aligned assistant to the protagonist. It functions as a powerful tool for justice, using data processing and analysis to solve a complex murder case that traditional authorities were failing to handle. Dot's interactions are respectful, efficient, and consistently work toward benevolent outcomes (solving crimes and protecting potential victims).
